tool_description: Analyzes current workload distribution across technicians and evaluates the impact of new assignments on work balance and capacity utilization.

technician_ids.description: List of technician IDs to analyze

analysis_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze for workload patterns

new_assignment_duration.description: Duration of potential new assignment in hours

include_travel_time.description: Whether to include travel time in workload calculations

workload_categories.description: Categories of work to include in analysis

error_messages: Invalid technician ID: One or more technician IDs not found in the system.
Invalid analysis period: Analysis period must be between 1 and 90 days.
Invalid utilization target: Target utilization must be between 50 and 95 percent.
Negative assignment duration: New assignment duration must be a positive number.
Unknown workload category: One or more workload categories are not recognized in the system.
usage: Provide technician_ids and analysis_period_days. Optionally specify new_assignment_duration and other parameters to evaluate workload impact and balance.

current_utilization.description: Current capacity utilization percentage for each technician

workload_balance_score.description: Overall workload balance score (0-100, higher is better)

overloaded_technicians.description: IDs of technicians exceeding target utilization

underutilized_technicians.description: IDs of technicians below optimal utilization

projected_utilization.description: Projected utilization after new assignment (if specified)
